    Spooky Transylvania

    Go Beyond goes Gothic

    1st – 8th October 2025

    What's to get excited about!

    Bram Stoker fired up our imaginations back in 1897 when he published his acclaimed novel, Dracula. He created a world inhabited by blood sucking vampires in gothic castles all in mysterious and sinister Transylvania.

    Count Dracula, thought to be based on the 15th Century Prince of Wallachia – Vlad the Impaler, was the notorious owner of a castle in Transylvania, near a small village called Bran. This is now reputed to be the dark home of Dracula.

    This fascinating holiday will take you on a gothic tour of Transylvania, taking in two famous castles. Naturally, Dracula’s dwelling in Bran, and also Cantacuzino Castle, where the recent supernatural Netflix series – Wednesday, based on the character Wednesday Addams from the Addams family, was filmed.

    Whilst here, we will also explore the local city of Brasov, visiting the Black Church and communist museum, and take a cable car up to the nearby mountain for panoramic, spooky views over Transylvania. We will also have time to visit another landmark, Rasnov Castle, with its Dinosaur Park that houses 120 life sized dinosaurs. Transylvania is also famous for its Brown Bears, therefore we will be taken to a special hide accompanied by a qualified wildlife guide to watch these beautiful beasts in their native environment, the Carpathian Mountains.

    We can’t wait for you to join us on this haunting holiday. We have been expecting you!!

    Where you'll be staying...

    Presenting to you, White Clouds Chalet, an accommodation in Bran, an oasis of peace and comfort in the heart of the beautiful Bârsa Country, In the middle of the picturesque wonder of the Carpathians, near the imposing Bran Castle (Dracula’s Castle).

    Food, glorious food!

    All of our food will be lovingly prepared and cooked by our wonderful chef, Helen.

    What you'll experience...

    We will meet at a London airport and you will be supported on the flight to Brașov-Ghimbav International Airport in Romania. Our mini-buses will take you on the 30 minute drive to the accommodation.

    Your holiday will include the following:

  • 7 night, full board accommodation.
  • All entrance fees to all activities and sites.
  • Airport transfers and transport in and around Transylvania.
  • Return flight from London to Brașov-Ghimbav International Airport accompanied and supported by our Go Beyond team.
  • A ratio of 2 guests to 1 Go Beyond support staff member.
  • Support from our Go Beyond team during the holiday.

    • Accessiblility and Inclusion

    Inclusion is important to us so we strive, whenever possible, to make our holidays accessible to all.

    If you wish to discuss your specific access requirement for any of our holidays, please contact us at your earliest convenience and we will do everything we can to welcome you to the Go Beyond Holidays experience.

    Holiday name
    Spooky Transylvania

    Date
    1st – 8th October 2025

    Nights
    7 nights

    Accommodation
    White Clouds Chalet

    Food
    All food will be catered for by our Go Beyond chef

    Price
    £3250 (All Inclusive)

    Day 1
    Travel from London to Transylvania, travel to our accommodation via mini bus, settle in.

    Day 2
    Visit the city of Brasov, cable car visit for great views

    Day 3
    Visit Bran Castle, home of Dracula.

    Day 4
    Rasnov Chateau and Dinosaur Park.

    Day 5
    Rest Day

    Day 6
    Visit Cantacuzino Castle, Nevermore School of Wednesday Addams.

    Day 7
    Brown Bear watching

    Day 8
    Drive back to Brașov-Ghimbav International Airport for flight back to London.
